project_descr: Scaling-up Antiretroviral Treatment for HIV/AIDS in Zambia

donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
- ARVs procured to treat adults and children on 332,500 people on ART by the first quarter of 2011
- 450 Health facilities providing ART services
- Expand treatment, care and support by procuring opportunistic infection drugs for PLWHIV
- Procure HIV test kits
- Procure blood bank items, laboratory reagents and other consumables to intensify prevention of HIV infection
- Improvement in stock levels at facility level of ARV drugs  65% of all ART facilities stocked according to plan by end of first quarter of 2011
- At least 55% of ART sites receiving supervisory visits

document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ZMB/00060851/GFATM Round 4 HIV Grant in Zambia - PRODOC.pdf
project_title: gfatm round 4 hiv grant in zambia
